text: aur (ye) vah log hain jo apane paravaradigaar kee khushanoodee haasil karane kee garaz se (jo museebat un par padee hai) jhel gae aur paabandee se namaaz ada kee aur jo kuchh hamane unhen rozee dee thee usamen se chhipaakar aur khul kar khuda kee raah mein kharch kiya aur ye log buraee ko bhee bhalaee sa dapha karate hain -yahee log hain jinake lie aakhirat kee khoobee makhasoos hai
